beer.beer_description: Your daily fix in beer form. We’ve teamed up with local Arrowtown roastery, Wolf coffee to add our signature roast at three points in the brewing process. A hot steep in the whirlpool, “dry beaning” for rich coffee aroma & then a concentrated cold brew for a depth of flavour. Smooth velvety mouthfeel, layers of rich espresso, chocolate with a refreshing coffee bitterness for balance.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 395 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 80!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 255 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 52!

items.badge_description:
Thank you for celebrating International Stout Day by savoring a delicious stout! Stout enthusiasts like you know that there's a world of flavor waiting to be explored within the stout family, from classic dry stouts to rich barrel-aged stouts, and everything in between. Here's a toast to the deep, complex, and delightful world of stouts!

Keep exploring the rich, roasted flavors and aromatic notes that stouts have to offer, and earn other great stout badges like Beyond a Shadow of a Stout, Heavy Weight, Dessert Time! and more.

user.bio: A latecomer to beer appreciation but having lots of fun

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 300 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 61!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 6)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 30 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 105 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 22!

items.badge_name: Wake Up and Smell The Coffee! (Level 4)
items.badge_description: Coffee has long been a flavor counterpart for stouts and porters, which means Coffee's not just for breakfast anymore. That's 20 different beers with the style of Porter - Coffee, Porter - Imperial / Double Coffee, Stout - Imperial / Double Coffee, or Stout - Coffee. Try 5 more for Level 5!
